website_summaries.verdict: This durable bottle's patterning should protect your skin from getting too hot, but you'll want to use the stylish cover for looks, anyway.
pros: Made from thick thermoplastic PVC with a cross-hatch pattern on both sides that diffuses heat
cons: Cover must be put on before filling bottle with water, which means your cover gets wet if you splash

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design - cover gets wet
customer_reviews.text: This product looks cute with the cover but unfortunately they have designed the cover so that you have to have an empty water bottle to put it on or take it off. Possibly other people are able to fill a water bottle without getting the outside at all wet but I think those people are likely superhuman. The rest of us when we fill a water bottle often splash water down the side which means that you want to be able to put your cover on a full water bottle once you’ve dried it off. Because who wants to put a soggy wet cover between your sheets? Just really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Love the PNW

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great company!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Fashy Hot Water Bottle. We plan to buy more (sharing is difficult. Hahaha) My favorite is the fact that they donate and contribute to World Vision through your purchase. That is such a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: tia.clay

customer_reviews.title: It does it’s job 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I just really all around like this and the sleeve and the way it worked for my back and cramps. Definitely recommend and well with it.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Brings me happiness
customer_reviews.text: We don't own a microwave so corn/bean bags are out of the question for us. With terrible circulation, I could almost ALWAYS use this for my feet but it's mostly a treat on cold winter nights. Love the fabric design and screw top... super easy to store and keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Best Hot Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Fashy hot water bottles. We love them keep you warm on a cold night or just for comfort!
customer_reviews.author: jjshrop

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to Use- no leaks
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this water bottle for about 3 weeks. It closes tightly, and stays secure in any position. The cover is pretty and sofa. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shoe fan

customer_reviews.title: Can't throw cloth bag into laundry
customer_reviews.text: Downside: cloth bag sown up around water bottle, making it impossible to separate the two for cleaning without damaging the cloth. Upside: much more attractive and is a good insulator.
customer_reviews.author: Shipwrecked In Texas

customer_reviews.title: Keeps our bed warm!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for preheating the bed on cold nights, and then wrapping my feet around it! My only issue with it is that the cover is not removable!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca O.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: The hot water bottle is fine but I had to remove the cover. It is too hard, scratchy, and gets wet when you try to fill the bottle. So I use my trusty all cotton pillow case instead.
customer_reviews.author: LynneC777

customer_reviews.title: Good quality water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and well made. White water bottle with lovely cotton flower-print cover. It’s a nice size and stays warm for hours. No leaks! Great for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: very convenient and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: the cover is a must buy bc the water bottle can get very hot. even with the cover, i sometimes wrap it in a towel. that small inconvenience aside, it provides a good couple hours worth of heat and pain relief, and sometimes it is still SLIGHTLY warm when i wake up in the morning. 10/10 would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hung

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Fabric was cheesy and they were too big for travel. Returned
customer_reviews.author: thorsten

customer_reviews.title: Safe and no smell
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Large opening for easy filing, no smell. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Reluctant Reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for menstrual cramps and aches
customer_reviews.text: I love Fashy products. They are durable. I give this particular product 4 stars simply because the cloth/cover is not removable and gets wet when filling the bottle with water. Otherwise it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: sweetiepie24

customer_reviews.title: It worked for both hot and cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I froze this water bottle and kept it while I was sleeping to cool down my body temperature. It amazingly worked well! The patterns are cute, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Second Fashy bottle we've bought. Appears to be higher quality than less expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

product_meta.title: Fashy Hot Water Bottle with Cotton Cover (Blue, 27oz)
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue Car

DURABLE & SAFE

-They all comply with the British Standard BS1970:2012 and are additionally tested by TUV&CE.

-Made with PVC material and designed for anti-explosion

-The material is odourless and recycable

-The jointless neck prevents leakages

-Made in Germany

CARE INSTRUCTION

-Watch out for safety with hot water products.

-Avoid direct skin contact for too long.

-In case of contacting it with skin when you sleep, it may be the cause of burn. Be careful when you use it.

-Do not heat it by putting it in the microwave oven or oven

-It’s not the product for kids use only. In case of the children use it, keep your eyes on the children when they use it.

-Do not pour hot water grabbing the hook attached on the hot water bottle. (The hook is for keeping the hot water bottle after using it.)
feature_bullets: PRODUCT COMPOSITION : Hot Water Bottle 1 + Cover 1
MATERIAL : Hot Water Bottle-PVC, Cover-Cotton 100% // Product safety certification mark-TUV and CE
EASY TO USE. : It can use it anytime, anywhere with hot water. It keeps its temperature warm for 4~6 hours.

HOW TO USE : Allow boiling water to cool slightly before pouring. Grab the neck of hot water bottle. Fill in water slowly up to 2/3 full. -Press the residual air out slowly and tighten on the screw cap. Make sure there are no leaks before using.

WHERE TO USE : when it is cold - Soothes aches and pains related to sports injury, menstrual cramps, arthritis and pulled muscles - Bring extra warmth anywhere you need it: in the car, while camping or traveling
